name: Peel Planet (WIP)
description:
Welcome to the potato solar system, hidden deep in the constellation of the great bear. Explore its potato-like planets and add a little fantasy with your mystical potato peeler.

Use the peeler with your mouse to peel the surface of the planet. Be careful not to peel back behind you, it would be a waste to peel the planet too much. Also be careful of its inhabitants, hidden as germs on the surface. Uproot them to bring the necessary life to the potato planet by peeling them.

..............................................................................................................................................................................

A game made with love (and lots of potato peelings) for the TrainJam #3, themed "Potatoes", by :

Nino Fouray : Prog

Vincent Bonnemayre : Prog

Astrid Merit : 3D Graph

Ludo Minosu : 2D Graph

Jules Feydy : Audio/Music

Nathanaêl Broch : Game Design
